history.proof: split. - intros H x [H1 H2]. sauto lq: on depth: 3. - intros. srun best use: is_finite_correct, Ropp_0, Rbar_opp_real unfold: real, Rbar_opp, is_finite, Rbar_is_lower_bound, is_lb_Rbar inv: Rbar.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: split. - intros H x [H1 H2]. apply H, conj; auto. - intros H x H1 [H2 H3]. apply H. apply H2.
